title: Age structure diagram - slow population growth

content.question: A country with an age distribution like that shown in the figure above, is most likely a country that

choices.label: is experiencing slow or no population growth
is experiencing a high death rate
has 40% of the population under age 15

content.answer: is experiencing slow or no population growth

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Explain how environmental concepts and processes represented visually relate to broader environmental issues.
